overview: This year, my Brazilian partner, Stanlay Miranda insisted that I make another video in Brazil during Carnival! (I've been too damn busy the last few years to do one.) So Stanlay flew Rocco and Cassandra Wild in from Europe, and we invited Nacho Vidal and Jasmine to come in from Spain... plus me, Hatman and Joey flew in from America! The only requirement was that we behave like Brazilians during Carnival!
title: Buttman & Rocco's Brazilian Butt Fest
